resources.string: Objectives\n 1.Understand the fundamental concepts of operating systems, including process and thread management, scheduling mechanisms, and memory management strategies.\n 2.Explore emerging trends and advancements in operating systems.
Objectives\n 1.Understand network layering, TCP/IP protocols, and end-to-end data flow.\n 2.Learn about network components, addressing, and routing.

Objectives
 1.To comprehend graphs as modeling and analysis tools.
 2.To introduce various data structures with graph theory.
 3.To learn graph theoretic algorithms.
 4.To understand graph coloring and covering.
 5.To learn the usage and applications of graphs in social networking and media.

Objectives
 1.To learn the basic object oriented concepts using Java language.
 2.To understand the advanced features of Java language.
 3.To understand the essential client side technologies for web programming.
 4.To develop applications using database connectivity and server side programming in Java environment.
 5.To develop smart device based web application and deploy in different platforms.

Objectives
 1.To learn about automata theory and regular expressions.
 2.To learn the concepts in the design of compilers.
 3.To learn about the runtime store organization.
 4.To know the data structures used to implement symbol tables.
 5.To be familiar with garbage collection.
